TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollableControl/DockPaddingEdges extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 決定停駐控制項的邊線填補。

span.span: Determines the border padding for docked controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別建立與指定的邊緣或所有的停駐控制項的邊緣上邊界。The class creates a margin on a given edge or all edges of a docked control. 您可以設定每一個個別邊緣此邊界的寬度，藉由設定下列屬性： ， ， ， 。You can set the width of this margin for each individual edge by setting the following properties: , , , . 另外，您可以設定所有邊緣的寬度相同同時藉由設定屬性。Alternatively, you can set all the edges to the same width simultaneously by setting the property. 如果控制項的大小太大而無法為其容器，控制項將會調整大小以符合容器，減去指定的邊界寬度。If the size of the control is too large for its container, the control will be resized to fit in the container, minus the specified margin width. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別， 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 此範例會停駐面板控制項中的按鈕，並逐一循環屬性，設定每個個別上按下按鈕。The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the properties, setting each individually on the click of the button. 此程式碼需要控制項和表單和名為的類別層級成員變數上具現化`myCounter`已宣告為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。This code requires that a control and a have been instantiated on a form, and a class-level member variable named `myCounter` has been declared as a 32-bit signed integer. 此程式碼應該在呼叫按鈕的事件。This code should be called on the event of the button. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int All { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.All : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定停駐控制項所有邊緣的填補寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding width for all edges of a docked control.

value.span: 以像素為單位的邊框距離寬度。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指派給這個屬性的邊框間距寬度會套用停駐控制項的邊緣。The padding width assigned to this property is applied to all edges of the docked control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別， 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 此範例會停駐面板控制項中的按鈕，並逐一循環屬性，設定每個個別上按下按鈕。The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the properties, setting each individually on the click of the button. 此程式碼需要控制項和表單和名為的類別層級成員變數上具現化`myCounter`已宣告為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。This code requires that a control and a have been instantiated on a form, and a class-level member variable named `myCounter` has been declared as a 32-bit signed integer. 此程式碼應該在呼叫按鈕的事件。This code should be called on the event of the button. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定停駐控制項下邊緣的填補寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding width for the bottom edge of a docked control.

value.span: 以像素為單位的邊框距離寬度。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指派給這個屬性的填補寬度僅用於停駐控制項的邊緣。The padding width assigned to this property is applied only to the bottom edge of the docked control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別， 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 此範例會停駐面板控制項中的按鈕，並逐一循環屬性，設定每個個別上按下按鈕。The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the properties, setting each individually on the click of the button. 此程式碼需要控制項和表單和名為的類別層級成員變數上具現化`myCounter`已宣告為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。This code requires that a control and a have been instantiated on a form, and a class-level member variable named `myCounter` has been declared as a 32-bit signed integer. 此程式碼應該在呼叫按鈕的事件。This code should be called on the event of the button. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定停駐控制項左邊緣的填補寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding width for the left edge of a docked control.

value.span: 以像素為單位的邊框距離寬度。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指派給這個屬性的填補寬度僅用於停駐控制項左邊緣。The padding width assigned to this property is applied only to the left edge of the docked control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別， 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 此範例會停駐面板控制項中的按鈕，並逐一循環屬性，設定每個個別上按下按鈕。The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the properties, setting each individually on the click of the button. 此程式碼需要控制項和表單和名為的類別層級成員變數上具現化`myCounter`已宣告為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。This code requires that a control and a have been instantiated on a form, and a class-level member variable named `myCounter` has been declared as a 32-bit signed integer. 此程式碼應該在呼叫按鈕的事件。This code should be called on the event of the button.
